useCase.name: User runs input through ReWOOAgent
useCase.description: The use case describes the process of the User running the input through the ReWOOAgent to achieve a final result.

mainSequence.step: User initiates the process by running the input through the ReWOOAgent.
ReWOOAgent simulates the world to determine its state.
ReWOOAgent observes the effects of the action.
ReWOOAgent determines the outcome of the action.
ReWOOAgent presents the final result to the User.
